summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2111 for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, from East Fifty-fifth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, under Ordinance No. 21205, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
